title: Kurt Hovelijnck
text:
Kurt Hovelijnck (born 2 June 1981) is a <a href="Belgians">Belgian</a> former professional <a href="road%20bicycle%20racer">road bicycle racer</a>, who competed as a professional between 2005 and 2013, competing for the , , Donckers Koffie-Jelly Belly and squads.
He fractured his skull during a training accident in <a href="Belgium">Belgium</a> on 17 March 2009, but returned to racing the following February.
